content_parts.content:
Sage is making German e-invoicing compliance simple and easy!

Your product is now enabled with AI-powered document extraction that allows you to receive and process Xrechnung and Zugferd e-invoices fast and efficiently. Document extraction helps you be compliant while eliminating the hassle of manual, error-prone invoice entry!

This powerful new capability is included in your existing Sage subscription!

content_parts.title: Easy access to view finance notifications

content_parts.content:
When you need to repost a purchasing and sales invoice, the Retry icon on the Posting tab opens the Notification history page. Depending on the cause, you can fix errors, such as missing dimensions, and resend or retry as needed.

User permissions to access the Notification history page required.

content_parts.title: Material tracking: Select all component lines

content_parts.content:
You asked. We listened.

If you reserve component stock and allocate it to work orders in advance of production, you can now select all component lines to issue the components at once.

On the new Work in progress inquiry page, you can view work orders and released items, as well as view costs from completed trackings. You can filter by tracking type and work order range, so you can organize and group the inquiry to match your viewing preferences.

content_parts.content:
You can now upload a purchase invoice in PDF format or sync emails to a sent to the Sage AI service. For each method, the Sage AI service scans the data so you can avoid manual data entry.

You have the ability to review and update data as needed to ensure accuracy. Finally, a purchase invoice or credit memo is generated, so that you can add item lines.
